text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GT75 TITAN 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop - Intel Core i9-8950HK, RTX2080, 16GB DDR4, 256GB NVMe SSD, Mechanical  Keyboard, Win10, VR Ready, GT75 TITAN-013!

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the MSI GT75 TITAN 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop - Intel Core i9-8950HK, RTX2080, 16GB DDR4, 256GB NVMe SSD, Mechanical  Keyboard, Win10, VR Ready, GT75 TITAN-013. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The keyboard has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the MSI GT75 TITAN 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop - Intel Core i9-8950HK, RTX2080, 16GB DDR4, 256GB NVMe SSD, Mechanical  Keyboard, Win10, VR Ready, GT75 TITAN-013. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The build material has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GT75 TITAN 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop - Intel Core i9-8950HK, RTX2080, 16GB DDR4, 256GB NVMe SSD, Mechanical  Keyboard, Win10, VR Ready, GT75 TITAN-013. The keyboard is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX2080 in the MSI GT75 TITAN 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop - Intel Core i9-8950HK, RTX2080, 16GB DDR4, 256GB NVMe SSD, Mechanical  Keyboard, Win10, VR Ready, GT75 TITAN-013 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
